name: runner game (noodguycoderman223)
description: you play as cube named block boi, block boi is running low on money. help collect coins to buy new skins UP ARROW to jump DOWN ARROW to crouch, dodge spikes in the way of all the coins, if you collect a diamond block boi will get a SUPER POWER (magnet/shield)  click cloud to get a save code and the load button to us the code. have fun.
